text: DESC: There is high recommendation on visiting the holy tomb of Imam `Ali (peace be upon him) on occasions related to the Holy Prophet (peace be upon him and his family) such as his birthday & Besat.This is because of the firm connection between these two great individuals and because of the perfect union between these two personalities.
INFO: When you stop at the door of peace (bab al-salam), which is the gate of the holy shrine, you may face the kiblah direction and repeat three times
INFO: You may then say the following
INFO: You may then approach the tomb and say the following
alssalamu `alayka ya qa'ida alghurri almuhajjalina al-atqiya'i
alssalamu `alayka ya sahiba alhawdi wa hamila alliwa'i
alssalamu `alayka ya qasima aljannati wa laza
alssalamu `alayka ya man shurrifat bihi makkatu wa mina
alssalamu `alayka ya bahra al`ulumi wa kanafa alfuqara'i
alssalamu `alayka ya man wulida fi alka`bati
wa zuwwija fi alssama'i bisayyidati alnnisa'i
alssalamu `alayka ya man khassahu alnnabiyyu bijazili alhiba'i
alssalamu `alayka ya man bata `ala firashi khatami al-anbiya'i
alssalamu `alayka ya man ruddat lahu alshshamsu
alssalamu `alayka ya man anja allahu safinata nuhin bismihi wasmi akhihi
haythu iltatama alma'u hawlaha wa tama
alssalamu `alayka ya man taba allahu bihi wa bi-akhihi `ala adama idh ghawa
alssalamu `alayka ya man khataba alththu`bana wa dhi'ba alfala
alssalamu `alayka ya hujjata allahi `ala man kafara wa anaba
alssalamu `alayka ya ma`dina alhikmati wa fasla alkhitabi
alssalamu `alayka ya fasila alhukmi alnnatiqa bilssawabi
alssalamu `alayka ayyuha almutasaddiqu bilkhatami fi almihrabi
alssalamu `alayka ya man kafa allahu almu'minina
alssalamu `alayka ya man akhlasa lillahi alwahdaniyyata wa anaba
alssalamu `alayka ya qatila khaybara wa qali`a albabi
alssalamu `alayka ya man da`ahu khayru al-anami lilmabiti `ala firashihi
alssalamu `alayka ya man lahu tuba wa husnu ma'abin
alssalamu `alayka ya waliyya `ismati alddini wa ya sayyida alssadati
alssalamu `alayka ya man nazalat fi fadlihi suratu al`adiyati
alssalamu `alayka ya man kutiba ismuhu fi alssama'i `ala alssuradiqati
alssalamu `alayka ya mukhbiran bima ghabara wa bima huwa atin
alssalamu `alayka ya khatima alhasa wa mubayyina almushkilati
alssalamu `alayka ya man `ajibat min hamalatihi fi alwagha mala'ikatu alssamawati
alssalamu `alayka ya man naja alrrasula faqaddama bayna yaday najwahu alssadaqati
alssalamu `alayka ya walida al-a'immati albararati alssadati
alssalamu `alayka ya man tasaddaqa fi salatihi bikhatamihi `ala almiskini
alssalamu `alayka ya qali`a alssakhrati `an fami alqalibi
wa lisanahu almu`abbira `anhu fi bariyyatihi ajma`ina
wa saqiya awliya'ihi min hawdi khatami alnnabiyyina
alssalamu `ala almakhsusi bilttahirati alttaqiyyati ibnati almukhtari
alssalamu `alayka ya waliyya allahi wa hujjatahu
ashhadu annaka ya waliyya allahi wa hujjatahu
laqad jahadta fi sabili allahi haqqa jihadihi
wattaba`ta minhaja rasuli allahi salla allahu `alayhi wa alihi
wa jahadta fi sabili allahi sabiran nasihan
mujtahidan muhtasiban `inda allahi `azima al-ajri hatta ataka alyaqinu
wa la`ana allahu man balaghahu dhalika faradiya bihi
ushhidu allaha wa mala'ikatahu wa anbiya'ahu wa rusulahu
alssalamu `alayka wa rahmatu allahi wa barakatuhu
INFO: You may then throw yourself on the tomb, kiss it, and say the following words
wa ashhadu laka ya waliyya allahi bilbalaghi wal-ada'i
ya amina allahi ya waliyya allahi
inna bayni wa bayna allahi `azza wa jalla dhunuban
wa qad harabtu ila allahi `azza wa jalla wa ilayka
INFO: You may then throw yourself on the tomb again, kiss it, and say the following words
yas'aluka an tashfa`a lahu ila allahi fi qada'i hajatihi
wa nujhi talibatihi fi alddunya wal-akhirati
wa alssalamu `alayka wa `ala daji`ayka adama wa nuhin
wa alssalamu `alayka wa `ala waladayka alhasani walhusayni

DESC: You may then offer a six-unit prayer of ziyarah; two for visiting Amir al-Mu'minin (peace be upon him), two for visiting Prophet Adam (peace be upon him), and two for visiting Prophet Noah (peace be upon him). You may also supplicate Almighty Allah as earnestly as possible, for your prayers are responded at this place, Allah willing.
title: Imam Ali (as) - on Holy Prophet's (s) Birthday
